summary: Test module that validates the Django migration executor’s end‑to‑end behavior and isolated unit aspects, covering scenarios such as atomic migrations, callbacks, soft‑apply mode, replacement markers, foreign‑key alterations, squashed migrations, unrelated migrations, model lookups, and rollback optimization.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the migration execution system by detecting regressions and confirming expected handling of complex migration graphs and edge cases.
